messages.message: Hi @Matt Macnak Would you be able to share the logs from the uscis sandbox please? I see that the Reduce UDF raises an exception on instabase.com (http://instabase.com)
Sorry for the delayed response - which ones do you need, celery app task?
just the job log; you can run a flow that creates this scenario, go to flow dashboard and download the logs for the problematic job
which step is the reduce UDF? `s?`?
flow has changed since that date but its the last one
so the last step in this job log seems to be `s11`, but there's no error returned in `s11` @Venkatesh the first error in this job is from `s8`
correct - the issue was that I was passing a value into a function in S11 that should have resulted in a error & it was failing silently

from the logs the reduce UDF / s11 didn't raise any exception; i'm not sure how to assess "failing silently here", if you can share your UDF and what you passed in that you expected to see an exception that'll be helpful. if the UDF raises a exception the flow / that step should fail; if your UDF raises no exception, flow will continue to execute as usual
